meanings.definition: A group of clay minerals characterized by their ability to swell when mixed with water.
meanings.sent1: The smectites in the soil expanded after the rain.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use smectites to improve soil quality.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog thought the smectites were magic beans!
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity swelled like smectites in water.
meanings.sent5: The scientist marveled at the swelling power of smectites.

meanings.definition: The most common type of clay mineral found in soils.
meanings.sent1: Gardeners often encounter smectites while planting.
meanings.sent2: The geologist identified the smectites in the soil sample.
meanings.sent3: The smectites in the garden seemed to gossip about the other minerals.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as common as finding smectites in soil.
meanings.sent5: The earth held tightly onto the smectites, its most prized possession.
